title: Game ran fine earlier today, now instantly crashes on loading screen?
body:
Cant even make it to loading screen, after champ select it instantly crashes.

I dont have lolreplay or any of that bullshit, the game ran just fine earlier today, but now it doesnt.

I even went back, REPAIRED THE CLIENT, and its still giving me the middle finger.

replies.body: You didn't happen to change out your monitor or install any automatic Windows updates during a restart, did you? Either one of those could have changed something and caused this.

No, I'm fairly sure that I did not have any automatic windows updates. My computer has not been turned off.

I didn't switch monitors, but I do have two monitors connected and it has not been a problem in the past (I connect my laptop to my tv as a second monitor)

Your TV secondary display may be contributing to this problem, so I'd recommend disconnecting it for now. Additionally, there could be some problematic drivers or issues with your Windows power settings. I'd like you to work through the steps within our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure the common solutions have been run through.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
